source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_SEQ_00<tab>A Tomran dwarf finds himself far from home. Far by Tomran standards, that is.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_SEQ_00Règle spéciale:  synchronisation de quête avec limitation de job ou de classe

Ce Nain est en train de demander son chemin à Sai-Lewq et Eueliss.

source:
TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_SEQ_01Regitt has made the arduous─but not especially long─journey to Wright in search of Ronitt, the young engineering prodigy whom you once taught to lali-ho. It seems that he has set his sights on the Crystarium, where he hopes to track you down, for reasons that are as yet unclear. You kindly agree to accompany Regitt and unravel the mysteries surrounding Ronitt's sudden departure.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_SEQ_01* Cette quête est  synchronisée avec votre niveau.
* Il n'est possible de progresser dans cette quête qu'avec la classe ou le job qui a servi à la commencer.

À Cherpant, vous êtes sur Regitt, un Nain des Tholl à la recherche de quelqu'un que vous connaissez bien, puisqu'il s'agit de Ronitt, l'adolescent timide qui s'était quelque peu dégourdi grâce à vous. Ce dernier se serait rendu seul à Cristarium dans l'espoir de revoir “”, c'est-à-dire vous! Connaissant sa peur maladive d'adresser la parole à des inconnus, vous avez convenu qu'il était préférable de le retrouver au plus vite. Pour commencer, rendez-vous à la jetée des amaros, à Cristarium, et parlez à Regitt.

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_SEQ_02<tab>You and Regitt eventually come across a Crystarium guard who claims to have seen a dwarf not too long ago, over at the Crystalline Mean. Wasting no time, you decide to pursue your one and only lead as to Ronitt's whereabouts.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_SEQ_02<tab>À Cristarium, un garde vous a dit avoir aperçu un Nain recroquevillé dans un coin de la halle du Juste. Regitt s'est im<var 16 /var>mé<var 16 /var>dia<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment rendu sur place pour vérifier cette information. Rejoignez-le.

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_SEQ_03<tab>Ronitt is, as Regitt had predicted, cowering in a corner, seemingly overwhelmed by the presence of so many “big folk” in one place. Before long, Katliss of the Mean comes to make the acquaintance of the two dwarves, which in turn prompts Ronitt to reveal why he has journeyed to the Crystarium. Until recently, he was under the impression that you were little more than a passing traveler. Having been informed of your heroic achievements, however, he is now determined to perform great deeds of his own, so as not to be outdone by you, his dear friend. As he cannot hope to compete with you in terms of martial prowess, he instead hopes to improve the lives of the various peoples of the realm through his skills as an engineer. Much to his surprise─and no small amount of chagrin─you reveal that you too have an affinity for crafting, to which Ronitt responds by suggesting that the two of you cooperate in helping the Crystalline Mean. Katliss explains that roving sin eaters have taken to attacking merchant caravans of late, and she is looking for a means of transporting their goods across Lakeland without placing the traders at risk. Ronitt toys with the idea of using his existing line of automata as a possible solution, but comes to the conclusion that major improvements must be carried out, necessitating the need for a large and fully furnished workshop. Katliss then offers the use of an area in Lakeland once designated to the Mean, though you will first need to gain the permission of Lorathia, the land owner, who is known to frequent the baths at Clearmelt.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_SEQ_03<tab>Dès que vos regards se sont croisés, Ronitt s'est précipité vers vous, les larmes aux yeux. Il vous a exposé son intention de suivre votre exemple et de se rendre utile, pointant du doigt l'indolence de son propre clan. Katliss lui a confié sa première mission d'intérêt général<var 1D /var>: sécuriser le transport de mar<var 16 /var>chan<var 16 /var>di<var 16 /var>ses à Grand-Lac. Elle a mis à votre disposition un terrain où l'adolescent pourra établir son atelier. Au préalable, vous devrez simplement saluer une certaine Lorathia, la pro<var 16 /var>prié<var 16 /var>taire dudit terrain. Rendez-vous aux sources du Névé et parlez à Ronitt.

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_SEQ_04<tab>Ronitt and Regitt get off to a bumpy start with Lorathia, who is not one to tolerate any of their endearing dwarven impertinence. Upon hearing of the plan to upgrade Ronitt's automata, she immediately dismisses the idea, as the current design lacks both the storage capacity for transporting cargo and the weaponry needed to fend off sin eaters. It then dawns on Ronitt that he has been carrying the solution about his person the entire time, and produces from his pocket a blueprint for a tanklike vehicle originally designed by his ancestor and famed engineer, Watts, which he aptly dubbed the “Rolling Tankard.” With room inside for large quantities of goods and a cannon capable of dealing with threats from a distance, all that remains is to actually build one. A task easier said than done, it would seem, as the designs do not show any of its inner workings. Not one to be discouraged, Ronitt claims he will be able to employ modern techniques to finish what would have been impossible in Watts's day. Lorathia eventually caves in and allows the use of her land, mainly out of curiosity, as she too was once an engineer. Ronitt goes ahead to survey the site of the new workshop, with automaton in tow, while Regitt heads back to Tomra to recruit volunteers to assist in building the tanks.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_SEQ_04<tab>En qualité d'ancienne mécanicienne, Lorathia a mis en doute le projet initial de Ronitt consistant à utiliser des automates pour transporter les mar<var 16 /var>chan<var 16 /var>di<var 16 /var>ses. Votre jeune ami a donc eu une idée autrement plus ambitieuse<var 1D /var>: concevoir et assembler l'automatank, un char spacieux et équipé pour le combat à distance imaginé il y a bien longtemps par son ancêtre Watts. L'enthousiasme de l'adolescent a convaincu Lorathia, qui vous a donné le feu vert pour vous installer sur son terrain, situé près de L'Impératif d'Ostall. Retrouvez-y Ronitt.

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_SEQ_05<tab>The plot of land on which you and Ronitt will build the workshop has promise, but there is much to be done before tank production can begin. There are a number of basic supplies that must be procured, though thankfully, Ronitt has already had his automaton gather some raw materials. Eager to see your artisanal skills in practice, he tasks you with putting together the first essential pieces of what will eventually become the workshop.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_SEQ_05<tab>Visiblement excité à l'idée de relever un défi inédit en votre compagnie, Ronitt a d'emblée réclamé votre aide pour construire votre futur atelier. Préparez ce qu'il vous a demandé et remettez-le-lui.

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_SEQ_06<tab>With the workshop─now known as Watts's Anvil─complete and Regitt returned from Tomra with a host of dwarven assistants, the complicated task of designing and constructing a prototype tank can begin. Your role will initially be to lend Regitt a hand in crafting various parts and materials, while Ronitt channels his engineering prowess into his next masterpiece.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_SEQ_06<tab>Ronitt s'est servi de ce que vous lui avez apporté pour monter en un temps record un atelier, qu'il a judicieusement baptisé “Garage Watts”. Il a même poussé l'hommage plus loin, en troquant ses accessoires habituels contre la barbe acajou et les cornes argentées du forgeron légendaire. Regitt est arrivé dans la foulée, accompagné de quelques-uns de ses camarades prêts à vous aider. À présent que tout est en place, vous allez pouvoir vous atteler à une étape cruciale de votre projet, à savoir le prototypage de l'automatank.

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_000<tab>Bugger my beard! You scared the life out of me!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_000<tab>Hein<var 1D /var>!? C'est quoi, ce binz<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_001<tab>Phew... For a moment, I thought you were a hobgoblin. Seems being so far from Tomra has got me jumping at shadows. Hold on. I know you...
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_001<tab>Qu'est-ce que tu fais là <var 08 E905 ((toute seule)) ((tout seul)) /var><var 1D /var>? Et Ronitt, il est où<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_100_001<tab>(-Regitt-)You're the one who was helping Ronitt! As for me, the name's Regitt. I forgot to introduce myself before, but I was there when that off little lad gave his first proper lali-ho. What? You don't remember me?
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_100_001<tab>Moi<var 1D /var>? Je m'appelle Regitt<var 1D /var>! T'as dû oublier, mais on s'est déjà vus à Tomra, lorsque tu traînais avec le p'tit Ronitt. Tu sais, celui qui savait pas dire lali-ho<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_SAILEWQ_000_002<tab>In all fairness, the fact you're covered from head to toe in identical outfits <var 1A 02 /var>does<var 1A 01 /var> make it a little difficult to tell one dwarf from the next...
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_SAILEWQ_000_002<tab>À votre airrr perplexe, je devine que vous n'avez pas croisé sa route...

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_EUELISS_000_003<tab>Well, they have their ways and we have ours. Anyway, it's wonderful to see you again, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Regitt was just asking us for directions.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_EUELISS_000_003<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, vous tombez plutôt bien. Notre visiteur ici présent voudrait se rendre à Cris...

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_004<tab>(-Regitt-)I'd almost forgotten about that! Actually, I was on my way to...what was it called? Crystaltown? No, no, that's not it. Something to do with crystals... Gah! Why can't I remember the sodding name!?
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_004<tab>(-Regitt-)À Cristarium, c'est ça<var 1D /var>! Ronitt et toi étiez censés y être<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_EUELISS_000_005<tab>You see, Ronitt is nowhere to be found. He did leave a note behind in Tomra, though.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_EUELISS_000_005<tab>Apparemment, Ronitt est parti de Tomra sans prévenir ses aînés, en laissant derrière lui une petite no...

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_006<tab>(-Regitt-)Yes! The letter! I have it right here.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_006<tab>(-Regitt-)Une petite note, tout à fait<var 1D /var>! Je l'ai tellement lue et relue que je la connais par cœur...

target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_SYSTEM_000_007<tab>

source:
TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_100_007(-Ronitt's Letter-)To whoever might be concerned,
I am off to the Crystarium to find my first and best friend, )) (( )) 02 /var>.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_100_007<tab>(-Regitt-)“Je vais à Cristarium rendre visite à <var 08 E905 ((ma)) ((mon)) /var> pote <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.

source:
TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_100_008(-Ronitt's Letter-)If the chief asks where I've gone, just make something up. The automata will take care of my work, so he should have no reason to complain. Oh, and don't forget to feed them while I'm away! With coal, that is.
Bye!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_100_008(-Regitt-)Vous en faites pas, j'ai programmé un automate qui bossera à ma place.
P.S. Si le vieux Xamott vous demande où je suis passé, soyez sympa, trouvez une excuse!“

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_009<tab>(-Regitt-)That's what it says, anyway. That boy may have mastered the fine art of a good, old-fashioned lali-ho, but that won't get him very far in the...Crystarea, or whatever it's called.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_009<tab>(-Regitt-)Quand j'ai vu son mot, je me suis dit<var 1D /var>: “À tous les coups, il va se prendre un vent.” Eh ben ça a pas loupé puisque t'es là et pas lui<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_SAILEWQ_000_010<tab>Yes, and even if the opening pleasantries go as planned, it's what comes after that matters most. He'd be the first to admit that polite conversation isn't exactly his forte...
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_SAILEWQ_000_010<tab>Le pauvre... C'est la première fois qu'il s'aventure horrrs de Kholusia, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>? Lui qui est si craintif...

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_EUELISS_000_011<tab>Since he went there looking for <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, maybe the two of you could go and find him before he gets into─or causes─any trouble.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_EUELISS_000_011<tab>S'il a pris tant de risques dans l'espoir de revoir <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, sa déception doit être immense...

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_012<tab>(-Regitt-)That reminds me, will Ronitt being away lead to any difficulties in the “rock phosphate for grog” arrangement between our villages?
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_012<tab>(-Regitt-)Et vous alors<var 1D /var>? J'ai entendu dire que Ronitt vous filait un coup de main pour récolter de la phosphorite. Vous arriverez à vous débrouiller sans lui<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_EUELISS_000_013<tab>The Orehound Ogre he built seems to be going about its work as normal, even without him here to operate it, so I think we'll be fine for the time being.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_EUELISS_000_013<tab>Il n'y a pas d'inquiétude à avoir de ce côté-là. Son Phospho-glouton fonctionne toujours aussi bien et ne devrait nécessiter aucune maintenance dans l'immédiat.

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_014<tab>(-Regitt-)All right, that settles it. We're off to find Ronitt! Although, I should probably point out that this is actually the first time I've gone more than a malm or so outside of Tomra. I'm counting on you, so please try to keep the mishaps and misadventure to a bare minimum!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_014<tab>(-Regitt-)<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, tu voudrais pas m'accompagner à Cristarium<var 1D /var>? J'ai l'air dégourdi comme ça, mais je suis encore pire que Ronitt<var 1D /var>: c'est la première fois que je mets un pied hors de Tomra<var 1D /var>! J'aurais bien besoin d'un guide<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_015<tab>(-Regitt-)Not that I'm scared, mind you! Ho ho, not one bit... Ahem! Without any further ado, let's make haste for the Crystaforium!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_015<tab>(-Regitt-)Youpi<var 1D /var>! À nous deux, on va le retrouver, ce p'tit coquinou<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_EUELISS_000_016<tab>And we wish you both a safe journey to the <var 1A 02 /var>Crystarium<var 1A 01 /var>! Hee hee!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_EUELISS_000_016<tab>Bon courage à tous les deux, et tenez-nous au courant pour Ronitt<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_EUELISS_100_016<tab>All by himself? I can't see that ending well...
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_EUELISS_100_016<tab>Ah, Ronitt, Ronitt...

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_SAILEWQ_110_016<tab>That's...unexpected, to say the least.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_SAILEWQ_110_016<tab>Il y a de quoi êtrrre inquiet, en effet...

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_EUELISS_000_017<tab>I must admit, I don't envy you having to keep an eye on not one, but two dwarves in a place like the Crystarium. Who knows what sort of trouble they'll get into?
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_EUELISS_000_017<tab>Bon courage à Regitt et à vous. Tenez-nous au courant pour Ronitt<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_SAILEWQ_000_018<tab>I have a feeling it won't take long to find him. For better or worse, dwarves have a habit of drawing attention wherever they go!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_SAILEWQ_000_018<tab>Je vous fais confiance pour nous rrramener notre petit génie préféré<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_020<tab>I've never seen so many people in one place! Unfortunately, not one of them is our errant engineer.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_020<tab>Tous ces passants qui font trois têtes de plus que moi... Y a de quoi se sentir oppressé<var 1D /var>! Je m'attendais à une grande cité, mais là...

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_021<tab>Where could he be? I wouldn't be surprised if he's whimpering in some corner, wishing he'd never come here. With all these big folk walking about, he's probably scared one of them'll trip over him!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_021<tab>Si Ronitt est vraiment ici, alors il doit pas en mener large. Je l'imagine bien recroquevillé dans un coin en train de pleurnicher... Le tout, c'est de savoir dans quel coin.

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_CITYGUARD_000_022<tab>Well, slap my arse and call me a phooka! You're the second honest-to-gods dwarf I've seen <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((tonight)) ((this morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((today)) ((tonight)) /var>)) /var>!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_CITYGUARD_000_022<tab>Ça alors, vous êtes le deuxième Nain que je croise de la journée. Si vous avez besoin d'un ren<var 16 /var>sei<var 16 /var>gne<var 16 /var>ment, n'hésitez pas à me demander.

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_023<tab>Really!? So, where was the first?
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_023<tab>C'est vrai, vous avez vu un autre Nain<var 1D /var>!? Il était habillé comme moi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_CITYGUARD_000_024<tab>Over at the Mean, playing hide-and-seek by the looks of it. Or maybe he was just lost?
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_CITYGUARD_000_024<tab>Oui, tout à fait. Je l'ai aperçu en passant à la halle du Juste. Il était roulé en boule, j'ai cru qu'il jouait à cache-cache...

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_025<tab>That's him, it's got to be! Come on, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, let's go and nab him before he runs off again.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_025<tab>C'est lui, c'est Ronitt<var 1D /var>! Il est à la halle du Juste, c'est ça<var 1D /var>? On va aller le chercher tout de suite. Merci, mon brave<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_CITYGUARD_100_025<tab>Another dwarf? Or is it the same one I saw before?
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_CITYGUARD_100_025<tab>Eh bien, je n'arrête pas de croiser des Nains aujourd'hui.

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_CITYGUARD_000_026<tab>I remember when dwarves were just something you'd only hear about in stories. But now, I'm seeing them all over the place!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_CITYGUARD_000_026<tab>J'ai aperçu un autre Nain tout à l'heure. Il était roulé en boule dans un coin de la halle du Juste, j'ai cru qu'il jouait à cache-cache...

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_030<tab>So, this is the Mean, eh? From the name, I thought it'd be full of scowling faces, but they all seem quite friendly. Anyway, where'd Ronitt get to?
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_030<tab>Eh ben, ça grouille d'activité par ici<var 1D /var>! Je me demande où est Ronitt...

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_031<tab>Ha! Found him!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_031<tab>Ah<var 1D /var>! Le v'là<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_100_050<tab>So many of them... So soddin' tall... I wish <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> were here!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_100_050<tab>Beuheuheu... C'est bondé de monde, ici... Comment je vais faire pour retrouver <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, moi<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_AUTOMATON03896_000_050<tab>(-Ronitt's Automaton-)<beep> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> detected.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_AUTOMATON03896_000_050<tab>(cliquette) <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> en approche. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> en approche.

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_051<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_051<tab><var 08 E905 ((Copiiiiiiine)) ((Copaaaaaaain)) /var><var 1D /var>!!!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_WALDEN_000_052<tab>Oi! Watch it, short arse!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_WALDEN_000_052<tab>Hé<var 1D /var>! Regarde où tu marches, petit<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_KATLISS_000_060<tab>So, when you heard that <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> is staying in the Crystarium, you came here looking for <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>? That's quite the journey for one so young.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_KATLISS_000_060<tab>Donc, tu as entendu dire que <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> louait une chambre à Cristarium, et tu as fait tout ce chemin juste pour <var 08 E905 ((la)) ((le)) /var> revoir. Eh bien...

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_061<tab>Gettin' here was easy! Startin' conversation's what's hard. Every time I try givin' someone a good, ol'-fashioned lali-ho, they look at me like I'm daft or somethin'!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_061<tab>Le voyage encore, ça allait. C'est quand je suis arrivé ici que ça s'est gâté. Personne ne répondait à mon lali-ho, vous imaginez pas l'angoisse...

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_062<tab>Never mind all that─you found <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> in the end. Or <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> found <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>, more like. Come to think of it, why were you looking for <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> in the first place?
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_062<tab>Heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment qu'on t'a retrouvé avant que tu fasses une syncope<var 1D /var>! Mais je comprends pas... T'avais besoin de voir <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> tant que ça<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_063<tab>It's simple, really. I always thought <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> was just a...I dunno, helpful traveler or some such, but the chief tells me <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var>'s a hero who risked life and limb to save the world!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_063<tab>Après avoir entendu ses exploits de la bouche du doyen, ouaip, j'étais bien obligé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_064<tab>When I heard that, I thought that it's only right that I do the same! Trouble is, I'm not sure where to start. But I'm not goin' back to Tomra until I find a way to prove myself your equal!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_064<tab>J'allais pas rester là à me curer le nez, alors que <var 08 E905 ((ma meilleure)) ((mon meilleur)) /var> pote se démène pour protéger notre monde<var 1D /var>! J'ai un devoir à accomplir, moi aussi... Lequel, je sais pas encore, mais pas question de rentrer à Tomra avant d'avoir trouvé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_065<tab>And while I'm not much of a fighter, there are other ways I can help those in need. Because unlike the rest of my village, who can't think beyond their next pint of ale, I've got big dreams! Ambitions!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_065<tab>Ici-bas, y a des tas de gens qui ont besoin d'un coup de pouce, un peu comme les villageois de Cherpant. Qu'est-ce qu'on fait pour eux, nous les Nains, à part boire comme des trous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_066<tab>Now, now. There's nothing wrong with a well-earned drink or ten after a hard day's work, but that's besides the point. How can you hope to compete with someone like <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_066<tab>B-bah oui, mais l'alcool, c'est sacré... Enfin bref, t'as pris une bonne résolution, et tu voulais que ton <var 08 E905 ((amie)) ((ami)) /var> le sache, c'est ça<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_100_067<tab>You might be known as the greatest warrior the world's ever seen...
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_100_067<tab>Je suis p'têt pas aussi costaud que <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_067<tab>But there's one thing I can do better than you: craftin'!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_067<tab>Mais j'ai un don rien qu'à moi<var 1D /var>: je sais fabriquer toutes sortes de trucs<var 1D /var>! Et c'est grâce à ça que je vais changer le monde<var 1D /var>! Eh ouais<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_Q1_000_000<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_A1_000_001<tab>Ha! I'm a crafter too, you fluffy-bearded nincompoop!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_A1_000_001<tab>Je suis <var 08 E905 ((une artisane)) ((un artisan)) /var>, moi aussi. Eh ouais<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_A1_000_002<tab>Actually, I've been known to dabble in artisanry myself.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_A1_000_002<tab>Ton “don”, je l'ai aussi...

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_068<tab>Whaaat!? You must be joking!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_068<tab>Qu-quoi<var 1D /var>!? L'artisanat, c'est aussi ton dada<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_KATLISS_000_069<tab>Why, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> has been putting <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> skills as <var 08 E4E9450B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9450F ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94506 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9451B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94522 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((a <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var> to help around the Mean for some time now.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_KATLISS_000_069<tab>Si ce n'était pas le cas, je ne lui aurais pas demandé d'épauler nos associations.

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_KATLISS_000_070<tab>Now there's a surprise. Had I known sooner, I'd have asked you to help around the Mean. If you have a moment to spare, come and see me. I've all sorts of tasks lined up for a master crafts<var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var>.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_KATLISS_000_070<tab>J'apprends des choses. Dans ce cas, j'aurais deux mots à te dire à l'occasion.

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_071<tab>Trust me to make friends with one of those annoyin' people who's good at everythin'... I suppose there's no need to make it into a competition, though. Why don't we, uh...what's the word...cooperate? There might be someone around here who needs our help.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_071<tab>B-bon, c'est pas grave<var 1D /var>! On fera la paire même si on n'est pas complémentaires<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_072<tab>How about you, miss? Got anythin' that needs mendin'? Or maybe one of my patented automata can carry out a few menial tasks?
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_072<tab>Tenez, z'auriez pas un problème ou deux qu'on pourrait résoudre, <var 08 E905 ((ma)) ((mon)) /var> partenaire et moi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_KATLISS_000_073<tab>Hmm... Where to begin?
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_KATLISS_000_073<tab>Euh... Pas que je sache...

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_KATLISS_000_074<tab>We did receive a report a few days ago of a caravan of merchants being attacked by roving sin eaters, not far from Sullen.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_KATLISS_000_074<tab>Ah si<var 1D /var>! L'autre jour, une caravane de marchands était censée nous rapporter des vivres de Maussade. Mais elle a été attaquée par un purgateur errant sur le chemin du retour.

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_KATLISS_000_075<tab>While they were able to escape without any casualties, they had no choice but to abandon almost all of the produce they were transporting. I fear it's only a matter of time until it happens again. Is there anything you can do?
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_KATLISS_000_075<tab>Par chance, il n'y a eu aucune victime, mais la moitié des mar<var 16 /var>chan<var 16 /var>di<var 16 /var>ses est partie en fumée. Et ce n'est pas la première fois que ça arrive... Toute solution serait la bienvenue.

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_076<tab>Sin eaters? Bugger that.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_076<tab>J'en vois aucune, à part toucher du bois<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_077<tab>This Fetchomatic Mechatoad might come in handy. A few extra spiky bits should do the trick. Hmm... On second thought, it might take more than that. I'll need somewhere to use as a workshop to carry out some modifications...
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_077<tab>C'est facile, il faudrait un moyen de livraison capable d'autodéfense. Un automate modifié pour le combat, par exemple. Mais pour le mettre au point, j'aurais besoin d'un atelier bien équipé...

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_KATLISS_000_078<tab>You mean to say you build these yourselves? It certainly is...imposing. In a way only a three-wheeled mechanical frog can be.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_KATLISS_000_078<tab>C'est ça, un automate<var 1D /var>? Sympa. C'est vous qui l'avez construit<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_079<tab>Now there's a fine compliment if ever I heard one! I think... This example of dwarven engineering was lovingly crafted by young Ronitt, here. He's a descendant of the great blacksmith Watts, and well on his way to becoming the pride of Tomra in his own right!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_079C'est l'œuvre de Ronitt! Y a pas meilleur mécano que lui au village!
On pense qu'il tient son talent de son aïeul, le forgeron légendaire Watts!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_KATLISS_000_080<tab>Yes, judging by the quality of his work, I can see why.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_KATLISS_000_080<tab>Ma foi... Bon sang ne saurait mentir, comme on dit.

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_KATLISS_100_081<tab>In fact, I have a proposal. If you're willing to lend us your expertise, we can arrange space for you to use as a workshop.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_KATLISS_100_081<tab>Écoutez. Si vous tenez <var 1A 02 /var>la<var 1A 01 /var> solution et qu'il vous manque juste un atelier pour la mettre en œuvre, on devrait pouvoir s'arranger.

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_110_081<tab>Really?
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_110_081<tab>V-vous feriez ça pour nous<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_KATLISS_000_081<tab>When I say “space,” that's essentially all there is. We'd planned to build a storehouse near the Ostall Imperative, but we had to divert our resources elsewhere, and it was never completed. It seems to me you'd put it to good use.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_KATLISS_000_081<tab>On vient justement de louer un terrain à Grand-Lac, près de L'Impératif d'Ostall. On projetait d'y construire des entrepôts sup<var 16 /var>plé<var 16 /var>men<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>res, mais un atelier de recherche et développement serait tout aussi indiqué.

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_KATLISS_000_082<tab>After all, a friend of <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s is a friend of ours.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_KATLISS_000_082<tab>Ton ami nain a l'air d'avoir de la suite dans les idées. Je vous fais confiance à tous les deux.

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_083<tab>That's very generous of you, miss! I'll turn that place into a first-class workshop in two shakes of a newborn's beard!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_083<tab>Génial<var 1D /var>! Un terrain, c'est pas encore une usine, mais c'est déjà pas mal<var 1D /var>! Merci beaucoup, M'dame Katliss<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_KATLISS_000_084<tab>Excellent. I'll inform those at the Imperative, so they aren't too surprised when automata start appearing out of the blue. I suggest you make yourselves known to Lorathia, who owns the land. She's a regular at the Clearmelt springs, so try there first.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_KATLISS_000_084<tab>Y a pas de quoi. Je vais tout de suite passer le mot à nos collègues sur place. Tout ce que vous aurez à faire, c'est de vous présenter à madame Lorathia, la pro<var 16 /var>prié<var 16 /var>taire du terrain. Vous la trouverez sûrement aux sources du Névé. C'est une Elfe d'âge mûr.

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_085<tab>Sounds like some meetin' and greetin' is in order. I reckon it'll go a lot smoother if you're there to cover for me in the likely event I put my foot in it somehow. I also have no bloody idea how to get there. So, lead the way!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_085<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, tu viens aussi, hein<var 1D /var>? Plus on est de fous, plus on rit<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_KATLISS_000_086<tab>Please give Lorathia my regards, and do try not to be discouraged if she seems a little...irascible at first.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_KATLISS_000_086<tab>Saluez madame Lorathia de ma part.

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_090<tab>So, this is Clearmelt, eh? Funny name for a bunch of rocks and a couple of ponds, if you ask me. More importantly, where's that Lorathia person?
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_090<tab>M'dame Katliss avait dit quoi déjà<var 1D /var>? Une femme d'âge mûr<var 1D /var>?<var 1D /var>... Mince, ça veut dire quoi exactement “d'âge mûr”<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_091<tab>You there! Old crone! I'm lookin' for Lorathia. You know where she is?
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_091<tab>Hé Mademoiselle<var 1D /var>! Vous connaissez quelqu'un qui s'appelle Lorathia<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_LORATHIA_000_092<tab>(-Lorathia-)Call me an old crone again and I'll rip that silly beard off and shove it down your throat, you mouthy little gobshite.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_LORATHIA_000_092<tab>Huh huh... Je sais que je ne fais pas mon âge, mais de là à m'appeler “Mademoiselle”...

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_LORATHIA_000_093<tab>(-Lorathia-)But if it's Lorathia you're after, you're looking at her. What do you want?
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_LORATHIA_000_093<tab>Pour répondre à ta question, oui, je connais bien Lorathia, puisque c'est moi. Que puis-je faire pour toi, mon cher<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_LORATHIA_000_094<tab>(-Lorathia-)Katliss sent you, did she? Hmm... If she thinks you're all right, that's good enough for me.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_LORATHIA_000_094<tab>(-Lorathia-)Je vois. Katliss vous a attribué mon lopin de terre...

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_LORATHIA_000_095<tab>(-Lorathia-)So, tell me, what are you planning to make in this workshop of yours? And don't go thinking you can impress me with a load of technical jargon. I was an engineer myself, you know.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_LORATHIA_000_095<tab>(-Lorathia-)Si ce n'est pas trop vous demander, pourriez-vous me détailler votre projet<var 1D /var>? En tant qu'ex-mécanicienne de la halle du Juste, j'aimerais m'assurer que mon terrain est utilisé à des fins valables.

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_096<tab>I'm gonna modify this here automaton so that it can transport goods and keep them safe from sin eaters.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_096<tab>Bien sûr<var 1D /var>! On compte programmer cet automate pour qu'il puisse transporter des mar<var 16 /var>chan<var 16 /var>di<var 16 /var>ses tout en repoussant les purgateurs. Une mission d'utilité publique<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_LORATHIA_000_097<tab>(-Lorathia-)Pah! It won't be transporting much of anything with those stubby little arms, let alone fend off attackers.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_LORATHIA_000_097<tab>(-Lorathia-)Hmm. Sans vouloir t'offenser, tu penses sé<var 16 /var>rieu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment que ce petit automate pourrait remplacer une caravane marchande<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_LORATHIA_100_097<tab>(-Lorathia-)And even if it could store goods in its torso, by the time it's done windmilling into the bastards, all those wares will have been shaken to buggery. Good luck to the poor sods who have to sell <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_LORATHIA_100_097<tab>(-Lorathia-)Sa capacité de chargement me semble plus que limitée. Et il n'a que ses petits bras pour se défendre<var 1D /var>? Si c'est le cas, je ne donne pas cher des mar<var 16 /var>chan<var 16 /var>di<var 16 /var>ses en cas d'échauffourée.

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_098<tab>Yeah, but the windmillin's the best part!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_098<tab>C-certes, mais... Euh...

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_099<tab>Ronitt, the old woman has a point, you know.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_099<tab>Ouah, elle rigole pas, la mémé...

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_LORATHIA_100_100<tab>(-Lorathia-)Less of the “old,” or I'll use that beard of yours to scrub the baths, with the rest of you still attached!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_LORATHIA_100_100<tab>(-Lorathia-)Hu-hum<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_100_101<tab>So, we need a way to carry as much as possible while strikin' the sin eaters from a distance...
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_100_101<tab>Si je comprends bien, il faut une machine capable de transporter des charges volumineuses, et d'abattre les purgateurs à distance...

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_100_102<tab>That's it! Everyone, gather round!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_100_102<tab>Ça y est, j'ai trouvé<var 1D /var>! Visez-moi un peu... ça<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_LORATHIA_100_103<tab>(-Lorathia-)Wicked white... It's so old, the ink's probably the only thing holding it together.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_LORATHIA_100_103<tab>(-Lorathia-)... Qu'est-ce que c'est<var 1D /var>? Ce croquis m'a l'air drôlement vieux. Je dirais même plus, vieillot...

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_100_104<tab>The design's from the days before the Flood, the brainchild of the great Watts himself. It's a self-propelled transportation device, armed to the teeth. I call it...
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_100_104<tab>Bah oui, il date de bien avant le Déluge. C'est l'œuvre de mon ancêtre, le forgeron légendaire Watts<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_110_105<tab>The Rollin' Tankard!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_110_105<tab>C'est une ébauche d'un véhicule de combat qu'il avait imaginé<var 1D /var>: l'automatank<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_100_105<tab>Its thick iron shell keeps the cargo inside safe and sound, while the cannon blasts any attackers to smithereens!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_100_105<tab>Sa capacité de chargement est au moins dix fois celle d'un automate, et je mets au défi n'importe quel purgateur de s'en approcher... En somme, c'est le transporteur ultime<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_100_106<tab>What an amazing coincidence that you've had the perfect solution in your pocket this whole time! Even before you knew what the problem was!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_100_106<tab>J'en reviens pas que ce soit Watts en personne qui ait dessiné ça... Ronitt, d'où tu sors un trésor pareil<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_100_107<tab>This ain't no coincidence. Ever since I found a bunch of blueprints in a tightly locked safe back when I was little, I've taken them with me wherever I go. Never know when Watts's ideas might come in handy!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_100_107<tab>Le croquis<var 1D /var>? Je l'ai trouvé quand j'étais p'tit, dans la cave de ma maison. Il était caché dans une boîte casse-tête, que j'ai réussi à ouvrir les doigts dans le nez. Depuis, je le garde sur moi partout où j'vais<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_100_108<tab>'Course, I'm not just gonna make one of these, oh no. I'll make a whole bunch of 'em, and send them all over Norvrandt. Soon everyone'll see how great dwarven engineerin' really is!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_100_108<tab>L'automatank peut faciliter la vie de beaucoup de gens. Si j'arrive à le mettre au point, ce sera une vraie révolution, et une énorme fierté pour notre tribu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_LORATHIA_100_109<tab>(-Lorathia-)But this only shows how it should look from the outside, with no mention of the inner workings. Are you sure you can pull this off?
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_LORATHIA_100_109<tab>(-Lorathia-)Attention à ne pas mettre la charr... le char avant les bœufs. Ce que tu as là, ce n'est jamais qu'un concept, quelques vagues idées couchées sur le papier. Tu penses vraiment être capable d'achever le travail de ton aïeul avec si peu d'in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_100_110<tab>I'd bet my beard on it!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_100_110<tab>Ça... c'est ce qu'on va voir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_110_110<tab>And to be honest, dwarven technology's come a long way since Watts's time. He probably didn't design the insides because there was no way to actually make somethin' like this back then.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_110_110<tab>Watts était en avance sur son temps. Son automatank était peut-être un peu trop ambitieux par rapport au savoir-faire de l'époque.

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_100_111<tab>Luckily, we've got my skills to bring Watts's ideas to life. I'll have a prototype up and runnin' in no time!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_100_111<tab>Mais la technologie a fait un bond en avant depuis. Avec les moyens d'aujourd'hui, je devrais pouvoir me dépatouiller. De toute façon, je baisserai pas les bras avant d'avoir essayé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_100_112<tab>Listen, Ronitt. You're not the only one who knows how to swing a hammer around here. If we combine our efforts, it'll be ready even sooner.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_100_112<tab><var 1A 02 /var>On<var 1A 01 /var> baissera pas les bras. Tu peux compter sur mon aide, Ronitt<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_100_113<tab>Cheers mate, 'preciate it.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_100_113<tab>M-merci Regitt<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_LORATHIA_100_114<tab>(-Lorathia-)I must say, I'd be interested to see how this all turns out. I'll let you use my land, as long as you don't turn it into a smoldering crater.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_LORATHIA_100_114<tab>(-Lorathia-)Hé hé, voilà un état d'esprit qui me plaît. Soit, je vous prête mon terrain. À vous de faire des étincelles<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_100_115<tab>You won't regret this! But if we're to build a workshop, we'll need a few more pairs of hands. I'll head back to Tomra and round up some volunteers.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_100_115<tab>Ça va être, genre, historique<var 1D /var>! D'ailleurs, je connais deux, trois copains artisans que le projet devrait intéresser. Je vais tout de suite rentrer au village et faire passer le mot. En toute discrétion, bien sûr<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_LORATHIA_110_115<tab>(-Lorathia-)Hold it right there!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_LORATHIA_110_115<tab>(-Lorathia-)Pas si vite<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_LORATHIA_120_115<tab>(-Lorathia-)If this place is going to be overrun with dwarves, at least give me some way to tell you apart.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_LORATHIA_120_115<tab>(-Lorathia-)Ce n'est pas pour dire, mais j'ai beaucoup de mal à vous différencier, vous autres Nains, derrière ces barbes postiches...

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_LORATHIA_130_115<tab>(-Lorathia-)How am I meant to know who's who if you all dress like that?
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_LORATHIA_130_115<tab>(-Lorathia-)Vous pourriez faire un effort à ce sujet<var 1D /var>? Que je sache au moins à qui j'ai affaire quand l'un de vous vient me consulter.

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_140_115<tab>Not sure if you realize this, madam, but we dwarves don't exactly have extensive wardrobes. But, in the interests of a smooth-running operation, I'll ask my friend Karutt if there's anything we can do.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_140_115<tab>Hmm... On ne peut rien vous promettre, mais on va y réfléchir<var 1D /var>! À plus tard<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_100_116<tab>Pff. So much for helpin'. More like “bugger off back to Tomra and leave poor Ronitt to do everythin' by himself!” Well, you're still here, so you can give me a hand instead. Let's go and take a look at this plot of land, shall we?
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_100_116<tab>Viens, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, allons tout de suite jeter un œil à ce terrain<var 1D /var>! J'ai hâte de voir ce qu'on peut y construire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_100_117<tab>These hot springs look awfully...hot. I'd go for a dip myself, but I'm worried my head would boil inside my helmet! Taking it off first is out of the question, obviously.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_100_117<tab>J'irais bien faire trempette dans les sources chaudes, mais mon casque risque de rouiller.

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_LORATHIA_110_118<tab>Nothing better than a long soak in the springs, and Clearmelt has the best for malms around. It's a shame I can't have the whole place to myself!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_LORATHIA_110_118<tab>Ces sources chaudes font un bien fou à mes ar<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>cu<var 16 /var>la<var 16 /var>tions, huh huh huh.

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_LORATHIA_100_118<tab>That land used to belong to a relative of mine who moved to the Crystarium to get away from the sin eaters. Since then, I've been at a loss as to what to do with it. I'm not exactly inundated with potential tenants, as you can well imagine.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_LORATHIA_100_118<tab>Ce terrain était autrefois occupé par ma famille, mais elle a été contrainte de déménager à Cristarium à cause des purgateurs. Ça m'embêtait un peu de le laisser vacant, alors votre projet tombe à pic.

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_120<tab>Welcome to the workshop! Or “workshop-to-be,” I suppose I should call it. Either way, this is where Watts's vision will become reality.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_120<tab>Voilà notre base d'opérations<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_121<tab>Although, I have to admit, it's not gonna be as easy as I've made out. Havin' you here does make the task seem less dauntin', though.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_121<tab>Tu sais, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... À bien y réfléchir, je suis content qu'on soit tous les deux artisans. Au moins, tu peux comprendre le plaisir que j'ai à fabriquer des trucs.

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_122<tab>And even though I was a bit miffed at first to hear you're into craftin' as well─stealin' my thunder and all that─I'm glad we've got somethin' in common.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_122<tab>Comme tu sais, j'ai toujours voulu mettre mon talent de forgeron au service des autres, un peu comme Watts en son temps. Eh ben, c'est le moment de joindre la parole aux actes. Autant te dire que je suis méga-excité<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_126<tab>If you can lend a hand between whatever it is the Warrior of Darkness does the rest of the time, it'd mean the world to me.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_126<tab>Et tu sais ce qui me motiverait encore plus<var 1D /var>? Que <var 08 E905 ((ma meilleure)) ((mon meilleur)) /var> pote soit à mes côtés pour relever ce nouveau défi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_127<tab>So, what do you say, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Will you help me?
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_127<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, tu vas pas me lâcher cette fois non plus, hein<var 1D /var>? Tu vas m'aider à construire l'automatank<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_Q3_000_000<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_A3_000_001<tab>What the world needs now is tanks, sweet tanks. Of course I'll help.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_A3_000_001<tab>Compte sur moi, mon pote<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_A3_000_002<tab>No. You talked yourself into this. Build your own damned tanks.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_A3_000_002<tab>Tu peux te brosser, mon pote<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_128<tab>Ah. Not quite the answer I was hopin' for. Well, if you change your mind, you know where to find me.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_128<tab>M-m'enfin, je croyais que... (déglutit) B-bon, je vais pas te forcer la main... mais préviens-moi si tu changes d'avis, OK<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_129<tab>Phew! I was worried you was gonna say no for a moment there! Now, let's make some tanks!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_129<tab>Hé hé, j'étais sûr que tu dirais oui<var 1D /var>! Toi et moi, on va former une équipe d'enfer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_130<tab>Erm, but before that, there are a few things we need to get in order. We won't get much work done without somethin' at least resemblin' a workshop.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_130<tab>Regitt va bientôt arriver avec des renforts. En attendant, on peut monter un atelier pas trop compliqué, histoire de gagner du temps.

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_131<tab>If you're in the mood for helpin', maybe you could rustle me up some basic parts? I've got a list of everythin' I need. Anyone with even a passin' interest in metalworkin' should be able to manage it, so I'm sure you'll be fine!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_131<tab>Pour ça, va nous falloir des outils dignes de ce nom. Vu que ça a l'air dans tes cordes, t'as qu'à nous en mouler quelques-uns.

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_132<tab>If you're in the mood for helpin', maybe you could rustle me up some basic supplies? I've got a list of everythin' I need. Anyone with even a passin' interest in handicrafts' should be able to manage it, so I'm sure you'll be fine!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_132<tab>Avant tout, il faut qu'on s'équipe un peu mieux que ça. Vois quel genre de quincaillerie pourrait nous être utile, et fabrique-le-nous.

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_133<tab>If you're in the mood for helpin', maybe you could rustle me up a few concoctions? I've got a list of everythin' I need. Anyone who's so much as brewed a pot of tea should be able to manage it, so I'm sure you'll be fine!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_133<tab>J'imagine qu'il nous faudra tôt ou tard de la peinture et d'autres produits spéciaux. Si tu pouvais nous concocter ça...

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_134<tab>As another example of my incredible foresight, I've already had the Fetchomatic Mechatoad collect a load of random─I mean, potentially very useful─materials on the way over. This should be enough.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_134<tab>Je te confie des matériaux. C'est mon automate qui les a ramassés, je l'ai programmé pour ça<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_135<tab>If you somehow manage to bugger it up, don't worry. We've got plenty more. I'll be takin' care of the rest of the preparations, so come and see me when you're done.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_135<tab>Il continuera de faire le plein de matières premières pendant qu'on bosse. Si tu tombes en rade de quoi que ce soit, hésite pas à soulever son couvercle et à te servir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_136<tab>Run into some difficulties, did you? Not to worry, there's more where that came from. In the automaton's belly, that is.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_136<tab>Pas assez de matériaux<var 1D /var>? T'as vérifié les réserves de mon automate<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_137<tab>Run into some difficulties, did you? Not to worry, there's more where that came from. In the automaton's belly, that is.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_137<tab>Pas assez de matériaux<var 1D /var>? T'as vérifié les réserves de mon automate<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_138<tab>Run into some difficulties, did you? Not to worry, there's more where that came from. In the automaton's belly, that is.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_138<tab>Pas assez de matériaux<var 1D /var>? T'as vérifié les réserves de mon automate<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_AUTOMATON_000_140<tab><beep> <boop>
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_AUTOMATON_000_140<tab>(cliquette) (grince)

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_AUTOMATON_000_141<tab><beep> <boop>
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_AUTOMATON_000_141<tab>(cliquette) (grince)

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_AUTOMATON_000_142<tab><beep> <boop>
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_AUTOMATON_000_142<tab>(cliquette) (grince)

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_AUTOMATON_000_143<tab><beep> Request for materials acknowledged.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_AUTOMATON_000_143<tab>(cliquette) Il vous manque des matériaux<var 1D /var>? J'en ai plein la panse<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_AUTOMATON_000_144<tab><beep> Request for materials acknowledged.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_AUTOMATON_000_144<tab>(cliquette) Il vous manque des matériaux<var 1D /var>? J'en ai plein la panse<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_AUTOMATON_000_145<tab><beep> Request for ingredients acknowledged.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_AUTOMATON_000_145<tab>(cliquette) Il vous manque des matériaux<var 1D /var>? J'en ai plein la panse<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_146<tab>All done? Let's see what you've brought me, then!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_146<tab>Ça y est, t'as fabriqué ce qui fallait<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_147<tab>Ah. I gotta say, I wasn't expectin' it to be quite this good. Not showin' off, are you?
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_147<tab>Ouah... C'est que t'as le coup de main, ma parole<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_148<tab>Me and the Mechatoad'll take care of the rest, so you go and put your feet up for a bit. Don't want you takin' <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> the credit, now!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_148<tab>Tu peux aller te reposer, on prend le relais, l'automate et moi. À mon tour de montrer ce que je vaux<var 1D /var>! Je te préviens, tu risques d'être <var 08 E905 ((surprise)) ((surpris)) /var>... à plus d'un égard<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_100<tab>There you are! Welcome to Watts's Anvil!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_100<tab>Notre atelier est prêt. Et je lui ai même trouvé un nom<var 1D /var>: on l'appellera le Garage Watts<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_101<tab>The two of you did all this!? I can't believe it!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_101<tab>Ça vend du rêve<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_KARUTT_000_102<tab>I-Is that you, Ronitt? Why, I...I hardly recognized you! Have you done something with your beard?
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_KARUTT_000_102<tab>Ronitt<var 1D /var>! Ces couleurs...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_103<tab>Well spotted, Karutt!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_103<tab>T'as vu ça<var 1D /var>? C'est un hommage, héhé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_104<tab>Accordin' to the legends, Watts had a brown beard and white horns. Seein' as I'm his descendant, I thought I'd follow suit!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_104<tab>Barbe acajou et cornes argentées<var 1D /var>: tu as devant toi le parfait sosie de Watts, le forgeron légendaire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_105<tab>Now that we've got a proper workshop, we can get started on makin' a prototype of the Rollin' Tankard.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_105<tab>L'atelier et le matériel, c'est réglé. L'étape suivante, c'est d'assembler un prototype qui tienne la route<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_106<tab>To tell the truth, I'm not used to havin' this sort of pressure. Still, I've got you and the others here to do the heavy lif─<var 1A 02 /var>essential<var 1A 01 /var> tasks, so I'm sure everythin' will go exactly as planned!
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_RONITT_000_106<tab>Je sais pas trop ce que ça va donner... mais ça ira<var 1D /var>! Toi et moi, on est les meilleurs, pas vrai<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_107<tab>Speaking of essential tasks, I'll be handling the supply of the various parts and whatnot, so come and see me when you're ready to show us those skills of yours.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_REGITT_000_107<tab>C'est moi qui m'occuperai de distribuer les tâches quotidiennes. Viens me voir si tu veux te rendre utile<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_SYSTEM_000_108<tab>Ronitt and his fellow dwarves have thrown themselves wholeheartedly into their newest enterprise, namely, to provide trundling death machines for the needy.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_SYSTEM_000_108<tab>Ronitt et ses amis se sont attelés à un chantier de taille. Seront-ils à la hauteur de leurs ambitions<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_SYSTEM_000_150<tab>You have achieved <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Friendly<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> reputation with Watts's Anvil.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_SYSTEM_000_150<tab>Votre réputation auprès des Nains du Garage Watts est passée à “Ami”.

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_SYSTEM_000_151<tab>Dwarf beast tribe quests are now available from Regitt at Watts's Anvil.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_SYSTEM_000_151<tab>Vous pouvez maintenant lancer des quêtes quotidiennes en vous adressant à Regitt.

source: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_SYSTEM_000_152<tab>Furthermore, you may now purchase wares from Mizutt.
target: TEXT_BANDWA001_03896_SYSTEM_000_152<tab>Vous pouvez aussi faire l'acquisition de divers articles auprès de Mizutt. Faites-en bon usage au cours de vos aventures<var 1D /var>!
